metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34328 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: [A PV vCPU can place a breakpoint over the live GDT]

notes.Note: mdeslaur> hypervisor packages are in universe. For issues in the hypervisor, add appropriate tags to each section, ex: Tags_xen: universe-binary

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
